articles.author: Bryan Armen Graham
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Frances Tiafoe in five-set thriller to reach US Open final - The Guardian
articles.description: The Spanish teenager reached his first grand slam final after overcoming his American opponent in an absorbing match under the lights in New York
articles.content:
US Open Tennis 2022
Carlos Alcaraz is one win away from a maiden grand slam title and the world No 1 ranking after outlasting Frances Tiafoe of the United States in a sensational five-set US Open se… [+7894 chars]
